original_text: The total amount of the gold from the wave offering used for all the work on the sanctuary was 29 talents and 730 shekels, according to the sanctuary shekel.
korean_text: 성소 건축 비용으로 들인 금은 성소의 세겔로 스물아홉 달란트와 칠백삼십 세겔이며

sentences.original_text: The total amount of the gold from the wave offering
sentences.korean_translation: 흔들어 드린 제물로 온 금의 총량은

sentences.original_text: used for all the work on the sanctuary
